General.Name: Guizhou Xinbang Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Guizhou Xinbang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells Chinese herbal medicines and other pharmaceutical products in China and internationally. The company offers cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, digestive system, endocrine, tumor and immune regulation, blood system, rheumatism and rheumatoid, urinary system, antipyretic analgesic, cold medicine, gynecological treatment, and anti-infective drugs. It also operates in medical services; and pharmaceutical circulation business. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Guiyang, China.
General.Address: Intersection of Hangtian Avenue and Xint, Guiyang, China, 550018
